name: UpdateOktaAccount
description:
Update details of an existing Okta account.

Call this tool to update information for a specific Okta account using its account ID.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Okta account to be updated.

parameters.name: okta_account_api_key
parameters.description: The API key for authenticating the Okta account.

value_schema.description: The API key of the Okta account.

parameters.name: authorization_method
parameters.description: Specify the authorization method for the Okta account. This is a required string value.

value_schema.description: The authorization method for an Okta account.

parameters.name: okta_client_id
parameters.description: The Client ID of the Okta app integration to update.

value_schema.description: The Client ID of an Okta app integration.

parameters.name: okta_client_secret
parameters.description: The client secret for the Okta app integration to be updated. Ensure this is kept secure.

value_schema.description: The client secret of an Okta app integration.

parameters.name: okta_domain
parameters.description: The domain associated with the Okta account to update.

value_schema.description: The domain associated with an Okta account.

parameters.name: account_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the Okta account. Must be 'okta-accounts'.

value_schema.description: Account type for an Okta account.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.api_key
parameters.description: The API key of the Okta account.

value_schema.description: The API key of the Okta account.

parameters.name: data.attributes.auth_method
parameters.description: The authorization method for an Okta account.

value_schema.description: The authorization method for an Okta account.

parameters.name: data.attributes.client_id
parameters.description: The Client ID of an Okta app integration.

value_schema.description: The Client ID of an Okta app integration.

parameters.name: data.attributes.client_secret
parameters.description: The client secret of an Okta app integration.

value_schema.description: The client secret of an Okta app integration.

parameters.name: data.attributes.domain
parameters.description: The domain associated with an Okta account.

value_schema.description: The domain associated with an Okta account.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: Account type for an Okta account.

value_schema.description: Account type for an Okta account.
